General.Name: Emei Shan Tourism Co Ltd
General.Description: Emei Shan Tourism Co.,Ltd engages in the tourism business. The company provides travel tickets booking, scenic spot analysis, and other services. The company also engages in tea, hotel, and ropeway businesses. In addition, it is involved in the big data, performing arts, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Emeishan City, China.
General.Address: No. 639, Mingshan South Road, Emeishan City, China, 614200
